(28/08/2008 12:02): jvdrean: I've added some information int he release notes for 1.6M1 jvdrean - (28/08/2008 12:03): vmassol: much better :) xwikibot - (28/08/2008 12:04): Main.ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise16M1 was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise16M1 xwikibot - (28/08/2008 12:08): Main.ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise16M1 was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise16M1 guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:18): hi all jvdrean - (28/08/2008 12:18): hi guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:25): I'm trying to set a virtual server with hsqldb. The main db works fine after switching the xwiki.cfg=1. I created a new XWikiServerLwuitmbdb page as explained in the howto. guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:25): I got "java.sql.SQLException: invalid schema name: LWUITMBDB". I guess it's not created automatically and that I have to edit the existing xwikidb ? guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:25): Does someone know if I'm right ? guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:28): vmassol: some idea ? xwikibot - (28/08/2008 12:29): GoogleSummerOfCode.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/ vmassol - (28/08/2008 12:29): guillaum1: yes vmassol - (28/08/2008 12:29): don't use hsqldb for that vmassol - (28/08/2008 12:30): hsqldb doesn't support it guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:30): vmassol: ah ok guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:31): vmassol: thnaks guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:31): thanks vmassol - (28/08/2008 12:31): mysql vmassol - (28/08/2008 12:32): this is the db we use the most with xwiki xwikibot - (28/08/2008 12:32): GoogleSummerOfCode.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/ guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 12:33): ok, thx again vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:24): jvdrean: seems like thre are still lots of pb on hudson: http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/XE%20trunk/ vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:24): do you need help? xwikibot - (28/08/2008 14:31): Main.ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise16M1 was modified by XWiki.Sergiu (Corrected the heading fix) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise16M1 cypromis - (28/08/2008 14:42): sdumitriu: great email, now I got it to work :) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 14:45): vmassol: yes, a lot of errors on hudson and the build is working fine on my computer vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:46): jvdrean: there's no roadmap for 1.6 on http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap. Should it be me or you who fill it? :) vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:47): (it's also missing the review of what was done for 1.5) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 14:47): vmassol: wdyt about removing the link from the release notes and wait for a consensus before filling it ? vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:47): we have a consensus vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:47): we've had it for a long time already vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:48): ok I'll fill it to help you since you're busy with the release vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:48): I think it's the release manager who should handle the roadmap though but he can ask for help ;) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 14:50): actually you already did 95% of the work with the roadmap 1.6 email :) xwikibot - (28/08/2008 14:53): Main.Roadmap was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added XE 1.6 roadmap) - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:53): yep xwikibot - (28/08/2008 14:53): Main.Roadmap was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:54): ok done vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:54): now I'll do the 1.5 evaluation jvdrean - (28/08/2008 14:56): vmassol: do we need to release platform/pom after the addition of clover coverage ? vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:56): no I don't think so (if you want to save some time ;)) vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:56): and if that's the only change of course vmassol - (28/08/2008 14:56): (jvdrean) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 14:56): yes that's the only change xwikibot - (28/08/2008 15:01): Main.Roadmap was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:02): jvdrean: did you fix the logo size? vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:03): if not we should do it for 1.6M2 jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:03): ah no, we need it for 1.5.1 as well jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:03): thanks for the reminder vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:04): jvdrean: don't you think we should upgrade our hudson instance to the latest version? vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:05): (since the upgrade is seamless it shoulod be easy) vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:05): https://hudson.dev.java.net/changelog.html vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:05): we're using 1.238 and latest is 1.251 vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:06): "Made a patch to SVNKit to fix compatibility issues introduced by SVNKit 1.2.0 incorporated in 1.238. " jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:06): the upgrade is very easy, let me check if I have the needed rights on the server jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:07): from the changelog : #  Detect the updates to hudson.war and report it. jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:07): which means we'll be pinged every 2 days :) vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:08): nice ;) (I thought it was autoreload) vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:16): jvdrean: is our hudson crazy? see http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/XE%20trunk/job/xwiki-platform-tools-trunk/88/com.xpn.xwiki.platform.tools$xwiki-xmldoc-update-plugin/console vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:16): how can this not compile? vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:17): do we have a setup issue? jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:17): Raff was suspecting hardware (possibly RAM) issues, I haven't ask the results of his tests vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:18): jvdrean: this looks wrong: http://hudson.xwiki.org/people/ vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:18): I'm pretty sure thomas as committed in the past 19 days jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:19): true, he commited on monday for sure vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:20): I'm really surprised hudson is not working. It's supposed to work very well for others. vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:35): 70% coverage on the rendering module, not bad jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:39): vmassol: hudson upgraded to the last version vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:40): cool vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:40): not working yet vmassol - (28/08/2008 15:40): (it's down) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:42): should be better now sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 15:44): Does the new footer area work for you? I can't get any section to open sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 15:45): (comments, attachments) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:45): works for me jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:46): do you get a JS error or smthg ? sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 15:46): displayDocExtra is not defined jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:50): cached xwiki.js on the browser side ? sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 15:52): Yes, probably sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 15:53): Yes, that was it jvdrean - (28/08/2008 15:58): sdumitriu: btw do you like it ? were you thinking about something like this with the "document information area" issue ? sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 15:59): Yes sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 15:59): Actually it wasn't my idea, I think Ludovic needed it for a client a long time ago sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 15:59): IIRC guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 16:00): vmassol: my virtual servers are working now ! Thanks for your help vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:01): guillaum1: cool vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:01): jvdrean: can I do one more commit or not? jvdrean - (28/08/2008 16:02): yes, even if I'm tempted to start the release even without a full build on hudson sdumitriu - (28/08/2008 16:02): Does anybody know if in trunk multiwiki works in other databases? And which? vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:04): sdumitriu: normally mysql, oracle at least. Not sure about derby vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:05): jvdrean: remember last time vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:05): :) vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:05): also we need our CI build to work vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:05): so this is a good chance to force us to make it work vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:11): jvdrean: done xwikibot - (28/08/2008 16:11): Main.ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise16M1 was modified by XWiki.Sergiu (Add "improved translations" and database name improvements) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise16M1 xwikibot - (28/08/2008 16:20): XWiki.caveden was modified by XWiki.caveden (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/caveden guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 16:22): vmassol: I would like to add google analytics. Which template(s) or xwiki object/class should I modify preferably ? xwikibot - (28/08/2008 16:22): XWiki.caveden was modified by XWiki.caveden - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/caveden vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:22): guillaum1: you don't need to change anythingh, jsut go in admin and change the header xwikibot - (28/08/2008 16:22): XWiki.caveden was modified by XWiki.caveden (Upload new image eu.JPG) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/caveden guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 16:22): vmassol: great ! jvdrean - (28/08/2008 16:29): looks like xwiki-web is building fine but it's stuck at uploading an artifact jvdrean - (28/08/2008 16:29): http://hudson.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-web-trunk/90/console jvdrean - (28/08/2008 16:31): ok done, I just have to be more patient ;) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 16:32): (btw we need to find why an upload on the very same server take that much time) vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:44): jvdrean: we're not building the XE installers on hudson? jvdrean - (28/08/2008 16:45): vmassol: no since they weren't building with mvn 2.0.9 (which finally wasn't the one used anyway :) ) vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:45): hmm that's not good vmassol - (28/08/2008 16:45): let me try with 2.0.10RC11/12 xwikibot - (28/08/2008 17:06): XWiki.bneves was modified by XWiki.bneves (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/bneves vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:07): jvdrean: what is the hudson email flood? vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:08): s/the/this/ xwikibot - (28/08/2008 17:08): References.AnteXWiki was modified by XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/References/AnteXWiki jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:09): the server was having dns problems since yesterday morning jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:09): I guess postfix has kept all those emails in the meantime vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:11): ok guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 17:13): GuillaumeLerouge ? I'm GuillaumeLegris ! Is there a GuillaumeLeblanc around ??? :-) xwikibot - (28/08/2008 17:14): References.AnteXWiki was modified by XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/References/AnteXWiki vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:15): guillaum1: hehe vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:17): I'm sure jvdrean is holding his breath ;) http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/XE%20trunk/job/xwiki-product-enterprise-test-trunk/133/console jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:17): I am :) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:19): vmassol: did you try to build installers with maven 2.0.10 ? vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:19): jvdrean: yep vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:20): it's failing for some other reason I think vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:20): I'm looking into it but I'm confident I can make it work. vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:20): I need to check the error we get with 2.0.9 vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:20): just checkede vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:20): seem to be the same error "] An Ant BuildException has occured: net.sf.launch4j.BuilderException: Application jar doesnt exist." vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:21): that shouldn't be too hard to fix jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:22): the error I get with 2.0.9 is the following : jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:22): [INFO] Error installing artifact: File /home/jvdrean/xwiki-trunks/enterprise/installers/windows/target/xwiki-enterprise-installer-windows-1.6-SNAPSHOT.exe does not exist jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:22): there are only "classes" and "maven-shared-archive-resources" in target/ vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:23): I don't get this error strange vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:23): but I built platform with 2.0.10 maybe thre's something different vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:23): platform + enterprise with 2.0.10 vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:24): and then tried installers with both vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:24): (2.0.9 and 2.0.10) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:24): built platform with 2.0.9, and generic installer build fine vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:41): jvdrean: I've rebuilt everything with 2.0.9 vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:41): and I get: " An Ant BuildException has occured: taskdef class net.sf.launch4j.ant.Launch4jTask cannot be found" vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:41): which sounds normal since it's not in the CP vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:41): if I add it it's when I get: " An Ant BuildException has occured: net.sf.launch4j.BuilderException: Application jar doesnt exist." vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:41): I haven't looked at this one yet vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:42): jvdrean: the build is very long for the tests... 55 minutes and counting... jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:43): yes, Raff will move the vserver to another machine soon vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:43): ah ok vmassol - (28/08/2008 17:43): I thought it had already been moved ;) jvdrean - (28/08/2008 17:45): from what I see we're at smthg like 60% of the selenium tests xwikibot - (28/08/2008 17:53): Design.SingleSignOn was modified by xwiki:XWiki.MarkusLanthaler - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/SingleSignOn xwikibot - (28/08/2008 18:14): Design.OfficeConverter was modified by xwiki:XWiki.daning - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/OfficeConverter guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 18:15): vmassol: is there a way to include an applet ? I didn't find a macro/plugin to do this vmassol - (28/08/2008 18:15): guillaum1: just include it ;) vmassol - (28/08/2008 18:15): ... guillaum1 - (28/08/2008 18:15): :-) xwikibot - (28/08/2008 18:23): Main.ExternalLinks was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (Added new links) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ExternalLinks jvdrean - (28/08/2008 18:23): Tests run: 97, Failures: 3, Errors: 26, Skipped: 0 :( vmassol - (28/08/2008 18:24): ouch vmassol - (28/08/2008 18:25): jvdrean: why did we receive 3 emails? jvdrean - (28/08/2008 18:25): one per module jvdrean - (28/08/2008 18:26): xmlrpc, ldap, selenium daning - (28/08/2008 18:50): vmassol: The image macro in xwiki syntax 2.0 is not implemented yet, right? vmassol - (28/08/2008 18:50): daning: correct vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:34): jvdrean: I'll need to commit stuff for 1.6M2 soon vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:34): what should I do? vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:35): maybe you can do a release:prepare for platform core? jvdrean - (28/08/2008 19:35): sure, give me 5min vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:35): it's ok I'm not in a hurry vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:36): I won't have something ready before 30 mn or 1 hour vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:36): just wanted to give you tome vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:36): time vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:38): but what if you need to make changes to platform core to fix the LDAP bugs? vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:39): so I think the best solution is simply to call mvn release:branch on platform core trunk wdyt? vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:39): actually the release process should be: vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:39): 1) create branches and update trunk to be the next version vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:39): 2) release on the branches vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:39): jvdrean: wdyt? vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:40): that's the best way to stabilize anyway vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:40): and we'll need 1.6 branches vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:40): ah no vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:40): sorry vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:40): this is 1.6M1... so we won't need them jvdrean - (28/08/2008 19:41): :) vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:41): forget this vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:41): I can wait or just commit when I'm ready and it'll go in 1.6M1 vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:41): I'll wait for now vmassol - (28/08/2008 19:41): I'll let you know when I'm ready jvdrean - (28/08/2008 19:52): http://hudson.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-product-enterprise-test-trunk/134/com.xpn.xwiki.products$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/testReport/ jvdrean - (28/08/2008 19:52): this time it took 48min for no particular reason jvdrean - (28/08/2008 19:52): and only 6 tests have failed jvdrean - (28/08/2008 19:52): .. marclaporte - (28/08/2008 21:15): hi! marclaporte - (28/08/2008 21:15): Is Guillaume here? xwikibot - (28/08/2008 21:22): XWiki.MartinRoy was modified by XWiki.MartinRoy (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/MartinRoy xwikibot - (28/08/2008 21:25): XWiki.MartinRoy was modified by XWiki.MartinRoy (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/MartinRoy vmassol - (28/08/2008 21:33): marclaporte: nope he doesn't come here often. I can give you his skype id if you want marclaporte - (28/08/2008 21:36): hi Vincent, yes, please vmassol - (28/08/2008 21:36): marclaporte: wikibc marclaporte - (28/08/2008 21:36): thanks! vmassol - (28/08/2008 21:37): you're welcome SaiKrishna - (28/08/2008 22:29): Hi Davi SaiKrishna - (28/08/2008 22:29): Hi David
